name: Hand and Controller Object Grabber Game
name_original: Hand and Controller Object Grabber Game
description:
Example itch Project for CMR103.

Controls

Touch controllers or hand input supported.

Trigger initiates the vibration for the controllers, the right controller trigger also has sound.

The grip button on the controller allows you to grab objects and place them anywhere in the scene.

The pinch function with your index and thumb allows you to also grab objects.

You can use either your hand or controller to touch the panel and spawn in objects.

Requirements

Oculus Quest

This project is in Testing, Please complete  a  feedback from here:

(Feedback Q&A Link)
